entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
